DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to assess the safety and tolerability of ascending multiple oral doses of HCV-796 in healthy Japanese male subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating the Pharmacokinetics of HCV-796 in Healthy Japanese Men
DOC.criteria: Healthy as determined by the investigator on the basis of medical history, physical examination, clinical laboratory test results, vital signs, and 12lead ECG.
